page.title: 16Life on The Virginia Estate
page.content: It is very quiet on the Estate, especially when the children are at school. The Clubhouse and swimming pool are useful amenities. There are Brownie, Guide and Cub packs for the children and occasionally disco dances. The Clubhouse is licenced for the sale of alcohol and is open every night except Mondays. The children look forward to the Estate Gala and the Christmas party. The Estate shop is very useful. It is run by Mr. & Mrs. Reynolds. Residents have to go three miles to the next nearest shop at{Faldingworth. The Estate Green is a good place for the children to play. Of 24 children living on the Estate and attending the school; 13 moved to the Estate from other places in Lincolnshire, 8 from other counties of England and Northen Ireland, and 3 from abroad.
